.. _`design_system_components_objectfavoritebutton`:

ObjectFavoriteButton
====================

.. figure:: images/component_objectfavoritebutton.png
   :align: center


Description
-----------

ObjectFavoriteButton renders an icon button that signals whether the given contextObject is marked as a fovorite, and allows to toggle the favorite state by clicking on the icon.

API Documentation
-----------------

:ref:`cs-web-components-base-favorites.ObjectFavoriteButton.ObjectFavoriteButton`


Related Components
------------------

:ref:`design_system_components_button`

:ref:`design_system_components_icon`
